message: Hi Bob, thank you for considering our product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to invest in something that will greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18,000. This is a competitive price considering the value it brings to your operations.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $18,000 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. It's the highest I can go, given my budget.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer, but I'm afraid $12,000 is a bit below my minimum price. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $16,000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to invest in your operations.
Alice, $16,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm sticking with my initial offer of $12,000. It's the best I can do.

Hi Bob, I understand that $16,000 is still a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to make a slight adjustment. I'm now offering the product to you for $14,500. This is a compromise that I think is fair, considering the value the product will bring to your business. I'm willing to meet you halfway again to try to reach an agreement.
Alice, while I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, $14,500 is still more than I can afford. I'm going to stay firm at $12,000. It's my final offer.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're firm on your offer, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $12,000. I'm willing to make one more adjustment to try to reach an agreement. I'm now offering the product to you for $13,750. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.
